text.__SUMMARY__: Tillandsia festucoides, commonly known as the fescue airplant, is a species of bromeliad that is native to the Greater Antilles, Mexico, the Cayman Islands, and Central America.
text.References:
An Annotated Checklist of the Bromeliaceae of Costa Rica retrieved 3 November 2009
Checklist of Mexican Bromeliaceae with Notes on Species Distribution and Levels of Endemism retrieved 3 November 2009
